acount_no,
name,

update user
acount_no = #{acountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set acount_no = #{acountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
